title: Library looking ahead
text:
Library looking ahead 0 comments 
There are a number of big projects going on in the Adams County Library which will make 2016 really exciting. 
If you saw the coverage a few weeks ago in the Gettysburg Times, then you know that the East Berlin Community Library is undergoing an expansion project. The ground breaking ceremony was held just a few weeks ago. This project at East Berlin will almost triple the size of the library! kAm%9:D 6IA2?D:@?
